pr_title: Add consensusTimestamp attribute to PubSub messages

timeline.bodyText:
nit: You're using Assertj, but you're not really using it:
assertThat(headers).describedAs("Headers contain consensus timestamp")
  .hasSize(3)
  .containsEntry("consensusTimestamp", CONSENSUS_TIMESTAMP);
timeline.author: steven-sheehy
steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
done.
want to directly test json, added comment to code too.
